Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Pinnacles Perth Monkey Mia dolphins Western Australia 12 Day Coral Coast Highway 11 Nights • Car hire • Touring Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions Perth and Western Australia offer a diverse playground for travellers, from cosmopolitan city experiences to breath-taking natural adventures along the Coral Coast. Centrally located, Crowne Plaza Perth is the perfect base to explore the city, with stunning views of Langley Park and the Swan River, an inviting lobby bar, alfresco dining at Gusti Restaurant featuring local produce and Margaret River wines, ensure a relaxing stay. Just 15 minutes from Perth Airport and minutes from the city’s major freeways, you can easily access attractions such as the WACA grounds, Perth Arena, and Perth Convention & Exhibition Centre. For adventure seekers, a 1.5-hour drive north leads to the Lancelin Sand Dunes , where a 4WD tour and sandboarding offer an exhilarating escape. Capture the stunning coastal views, feel the thrill of the dunes, and embrace off-road exploration. Heading further afield, Western Australia’s Coral Coast offers unforgettable coastal escapes. In Geraldton, Hospitality Geraldton by Best Western provides comfortable accommodations near pristine surf beaches and the Abrolhos Islands, perfect for fishing and diving adventures. RAC Monkey Mia Dolphin Resort delivers a once-in-a-lifetime experience with dolphin encounters in the Shark Bay World Heritage Area, complete with beachfront dining and modern facilities. For reef enthusiasts, Potshot Resort in Exmouth provides easy access to Cape Range National Park and Ningaloo Reef, with full-day snorkeling tours showcasing turtles, manta rays, and colourful coral gardens. Hospitality Carnarvon by Best Western offers a tranquil base for exploring the Ningaloo Reef and Gascoyne Murchison Outback Pathway. Meanwhile, Kalbarri Edge Resort and RAC Cervantes Holiday Park provide family-friendly and relaxing coastal retreats, with nearby attractions including the Pinnacles Desert and scenic walking trails. From city sophistication to untamed beaches and reefs, Western Australia promises experiences that blend luxury, adventure, and natural wonder, ensuring a truly unforgettable journey. View more View less 11 nights + tour, car hire from $ 2769 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until 31 Mar 26 or unless sold out prior Your inclusions 12 Days Car Hire in a Toyota CH-R or similar – Return Perth Airport 2 Nights at Crowne Plaza, Perth in a Standard Room 4WD and Sandboarding Adventure 1 Night at Hospitality Geraldton by Best Western in a Premium Queen Room 2 Night at Monkey Mia Dolphin Resort and Lodge in a Garden Room 1 Night at Hospitality Carnarvon by Best Western in a Queen Executive Room 2 Nights at Potshot Resort, Exmouth in a Standard Room Full Day Outer Reef Snorkeling Tour 1 Night at Hospitality Carnarvon by Best Western in a Queen Executive Room 1 Night at Kalbarri Edge Resort, Kalbarri in a Studio Room 1 Night at RAC Cervantes Holiday Park, Cervantes in a One Bedroom Studio EXCLUDES: All National Park fees Price from From $2799 per person share twin Travel: 01 May – 24 Jun 26 From $2949 per person share twin Travel: 25 Jun – 18 Jul 26 From $2769 per person share twin Travel: 19 Jul - 27 Aug 26 From $2829 per person share twin Travel: 28 Aug – 16 Sep 26 From $3059 per person share twin Travel: 17 Sep – 10 Oct 26 From $2849 per person share twin Travel: 11 Oct - 31 Oct 26 Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings to 31 Mar 26 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 28 Oct 25 • Prices are there after subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • International/Domestic flights not included. Book by 31 March 2026 unless sold out prior. The package price provided is a GUIDE PRICE ONLY and you will need to get a more accurate price by getting a quote for your travel date due to DYNAMIC availability. Valid for travel between 01 May to 31 October 2026. Car hire is with Avis Australia based on a pickup drop off Perth Airport and subject to dynamic availability and excess conditions. Inclusions are subject to change based on supplier operational capabilities. Blackout dates and surcharges may apply over special events, public holidays, and holiday periods • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Payment schedule will be advised at time of booking • Some surcharges, closeouts and accommodation restrictions apply • Min/max stays apply • Twin share is based on 2 adults sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Any hotel credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & can’t be exchanged for cash • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Packages are subject to availability • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
